metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28938 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in some Intel(R) SSD Tools software before version mdadm-4.2-rc2 may allow a priviledged user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> mdadm generally requires root privileges

criterions.comment: mdadm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
